job.title: Software Developer
job.description: ltstronggtltugtoverviewltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtwe are not just offering a job but a meaningful career come join our passionate teamltbrgtltbrgtas a fortune company we hire the best employees to serve our customers making us a leader in the insurance and financial services industry state farm embraces diversity and inclusion to ensure a workforce that is engaged builds on the strengths and talents of all associates and creates a good neighbor cultureltbrgtltbrgtwe offer competitive benefits and pay with the potential for an annual financial award based on both individual and enterprise performance our employees have an opportunity to participate in volunteer events within the community and engage in a learning culture we offer programs to assist with tuition reimbursement professional designations employee development wellness initiatives and moreltbrgtltbrgtvisit our careers page for more information on our benefits locations and the process of joining the state farm teamltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtresponsibilitiesltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtltstronggtltugta day in the life of a software developerltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtstate farm is seeking a bright diligent software developers to join our enterprise technology departmentltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtwe need youltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtas a member of a small selfguided productoriented team you will design develop and implement new functionality and troubleshoot application issues in order to provide solutions this position allows you the flexibility to determine what to work on as well as the chance to work with an established team which is willing to help you learn you will work across claims with other product teams to gain a broad knowledge of our claims systems and gain a wide range of relationships within claims you will have the opportunity to work on new and existing technologies all while having the satisfaction of knowing that your work has helped othersltbrgtltulgtltligtapplicants are required to be eligible to lawfully work in the us immediately employer will not sponsor applicants for us work authorization eg hb visa for this opportunityltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtqualificationsltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtltstronggtltugtwe are looking for candidates withltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtobject oriented programming experience using javaltligtltligtgood communication skills verbal and writtenltligtltligtexperience in the followingltligtltulgtltligtjavaltligtltligtjava scriptltligtltligtsqlltligtltligtspring frameworkltligtltligtspring bootltligtltligtgitltligtltligtsalesforce lightning web components lwc apex ampamp auraltbrgtltligtltulgtltulgtltstronggtltugtadditional desired skillsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtshows initiative and willingness to learn and share knowledge ltligtltligtpassion for serving the customerltligtltligtstrong organizational communication and problem solving skills ltligtltligtstrong teamwork skills ltligtltligtexposure to agile development techniques is helpful ltligtltligtexposure to public cloud capabilities is helpful ltligtltligtdesire for working with data analysis ltligtltligtpassion for working with databases and data structuresltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtincumbency ltstronggtthis position will have a month incumbency period beginning on the effective date of the position which must be met before the employee can post for any other lateral state farm position employees may be considered for leadership or technology engineer openings at any time and a promotional position within the same job structure ie professionaltechnical or paraprofessionalsupport after months from the effective date of the position in these cases the remaining incumbency would be waived the incumbency period does not affect the atwill relationship between state farm and the employee and does not create an employment contract nor contractual rightsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtwhat you can expectltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtcompetitive candidates may be invited to participate in the interview process this is where the excitement begins
